entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is leading a group of people to a place with hundreds of chairs. She is described as the one in charge, and her presence is mentioned first.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is following Professor McGonagall and does not recognize most of the people present. He is described as a person who is part of this group.

entities.name: kingsley shacklebolt
entities.description: Kingsley Shacklebolt is mentioned as a member of the Order of the Phoenix, and Harry recognizes him.

entities.name: mad-eye moody
entities.description: Mad-Eye Moody is also mentioned as a member of the Order of the Phoenix, and Harry recognizes him.

entities.name: tonks
entities.description: Tonks is described as having her hair miraculously returned to its original pink color. She is also mentioned as holding hands with Remus Lupin.

entities.name: remus lupin
entities.description: Remus Lupin is described as being in a romantic relationship with Tonks, and they are holding hands.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is mentioned as part of the group, along with his wife Mrs. Weasley.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is mentioned as part of the group, along with her husband Mr. Weasley.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is described as being supported by Fleur and followed by his brothers Fred and George.

entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is described as supporting Bill, along with her husband's brothers Fred and George.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as part of the group, along with his brother George and their father Mr. Weasley.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as part of the group, along with his brother Fred and their father Mr. Weasley.

entities.name: madame maxime
entities.description: Madame Maxime is described as taking up two-and-a-half chairs on her own, indicating that she is a large or imposing person.

entities.name: tom
entities.description: Tom is mentioned as the landlord of the Leaky Cauldron, and he is part of the group present at this gathering.

entities.name: arabella figg
entities.description: Arabella Figg is mentioned as part of the group, along with other members of the wizarding community.

relationships.description: Professor McGonagall is leading Harry and others to a place with hundreds of chairs.
Tonks and Remus Lupin are holding hands, indicating that they are in a romantic relationship.
Fleur is supporting Bill, along with his brothers Fred and George.
